mapper.select: SELECT a.prod_id, a.prod_name, a.prod_price, b.supply_date, b.supply_bcd, c.splylist_sum FROM prod a, supply b, supply_list c WHERE b.supply_bcd = #{supply_bcd} AND c.prod_id = a.prod_id AND c.supply_bcd = b.supply_bcd
SELECT supply_bcd ,supply_date ,supply_state ,supply_info ,place_id FROM SUPPLY WHERE PLACE_ID=#{place_id} ORDER BY supply_date DESC

SELECT rownum rnum,T.* FROM ( SELECT a.supply_bcd, a.supply_date,a.supply_state, sum(b.splylist_sum) splylist_sum, sum(c.prod_price*b.splylist_sum) sum FROM supply a, supply_list b, prod c WHERE a.place_id=#{place_id} AND c.prod_id = b.prod_id AND a.supply_state = 12 AND a.supply_bcd = b.supply_bcd GROUP BY a.supply_bcd, a.supply_date,a.supply_state ) T WHERE rownum BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize}+1 AND #{page}*#{pageSize}
SELECT sum(a.prod_cost* b.splylist_sum) FROM prod a, supply_list b WHERE b.supply_bcd=#{supply_bcd} AND a.prod_id = b.prod_id
SELECT * FROM member a, supply b WHERE b.supply_bcd=#{supply_bcd} AND a.mem_id = b.place_id

select a.supply_bcd, a.supply_date , a.supply_state, a.place_id, sum(b.SPLYLIST_SUM)as total_amount , sum(b.SPLYLIST_SUM * c.prod_cost) as total FROM supply a, supply_list b, prod c WHERE a.place_id =#{place_id} AND a.supply_state !='12' AND b.prod_id = c.prod_id AND a.SUPPLY_BCD = b.SUPPLY_BCD GROUP BY a.supply_bcd, a.supply_date,a.supply_state, a.place_id ORDER BY a.supply_date desc
SELECT a.prod_id, a.prod_name , b.splylist_sum , a.prod_cost, (a.prod_cost*b.splylist_sum) as price FROM prod a, supply_list b WHERE a.prod_id = b.prod_id AND b.supply_bcd=#{supply_bcd}
